    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Direction PositionI.directionFrom(PositionI p)
      return the direction in which this position is with respect to p.
      double PositionI.distance(PositionI p)
      return the distance between this position and p.
      boolean PositionI.eastOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is east of p.
      boolean GeographicalZoneI.in(PositionI p)
      return true if p is in this geographical zone.
      boolean PositionI.northOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is north of p.
      boolean PositionI.southOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is south of p.
      boolean PositionI.westOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is west of p.
